name: Getty Images
description: The first lady earned six figures from an agreement with Getty Images that paid royalties to the Trumps and mandated photos be used in positive coverage.

stories.description: The first lady earned six figures from an agreement with Getty Images that paid royalties to the Trumps and mandated photos be used in positive coverage.
stories.headline: News media paid Melania Trump thousands for use of photos in 'positive stories only'
